tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE media_marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    click_through_rate FLOAT,
    conversions INT,
    return_on_investment DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  click_through_rate FLOAT,
  conversions INT,
  return_on_investment FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  date DATE,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  revenue FLOAT,
  PRIMARY KEY (performance_id, campaign_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES marketing_campaigns(campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReturnOnInvestment (
    roi_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    date DATE, 
    expenditure DECIMAL(10,2),
    revenue DECIMAL(10,2)
);
